ANS.Chain: ROOT(950元(OP_Sum(350元(OP_Multiplication(1件|n1 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! ))|400元(OP_Multiplication(1件|n2 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! ))|200元(OP_Multiplication(1件|n3 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! )))))
ANS.Explanation: Ans: 1件 n1 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! 就是 1 * 1 = 350元 1件 n2 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! 就是 1 * 2 = 400元 1件 n3 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! 就是 1 * 3 = 200元 Thus, Totally 花 350元 + 400元 + 200元 = 950元
